properties.address: The Trinity Centre, Stonehill Green, Westlea, Swindon SN5 7AR
properties.description: Open from 24/11/2022. A community space where everyone is welcome. Free hot drinks and cake, as well as free WiFi, charging facilities, parking, games, crafts, and space for children to play. There will also be craft activities and board games available.
